main event: Witnesses observed 2-3 bright lights in the sky moving slowly from NE to SW.
interesting points: Lights were steady and not blinking,Weather conditions were clear during the sighting,No sonic booms or other sounds were heard,The sighting lasted approximately 1-2 minutes,No explanation was found for the lights.
sighted object: two to three bright lights in the sky
witness description: A family with children observing the lights in their backyard.
